channel.title: Hi! I'm Huizi on We Are All Stardust
channel.description: Recent content in Hi! I'm Huizi on We Are All Stardust

item.title: Some thoughts after reading the Little Prince
item.description: The Little Prince is one of my favorite books as a kid. The writer meets a little prince when his plane crashed into Sahara, and he is from a planet far away. He has a rose that he really loves and takes care of, while a fox wants to be tamed by him. These are the two little stories in the book that touches my heart the most. The rose is silly and naive, and she exaggerates her emotions to get more attention.

item.title: Contact
item.description: I’d love to hear from you! Please send me a message if you have any thoughts or suggestions, or just to say Hi! Just fill out the form below and I will get back to you! Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
